00037 #include <stdio.h>
00038 #include <stdlib.h>
00039 #include <string.h>
00040 #include "Basic.h"  // CUnit/Basic.h
00041 #include "time_conversion.h"
00042 #include "test_geodesy.h"

00048 
00049 /** \brief The function where all suites and tests are added. */
00050 int AddTests();
00051 
00052 /** \brief Print the time the test occurred to stdout. */
00053 static void print_system_time(void);
00054 
00055 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00056 {
00057   CU_BasicRunMode mode = CU_BRM_VERBOSE;
00058   CU_ErrorAction error_action = CUEA_IGNORE;
00059   int i;
00060 
00061   setvbuf(stdout, NULL, _IONBF, 0);
00062 
00063   for (i=1 ; i<argc ; i++) 
00064   {
00065     if (!strcmp("-i", argv[i])) 
00066     {
00067       error_action = CUEA_IGNORE;
00068     }
00069     else if (!strcmp("-f", argv[i])) 
00070     {
00071       error_action = CUEA_FAIL;
00072     }
00073     else if (!strcmp("-A", argv[i])) 
00074     {
00075       error_action = CUEA_ABORT;
00076     }
00077     else if (!strcmp("-s", argv[i])) 
00078     {
00079       mode = CU_BRM_SILENT;
00080     }
00081     else if (!strcmp("-n", argv[i])) 
00082     {
00083       mode = CU_BRM_NORMAL;
00084     }
00085     else if (!strcmp("-v", argv[i])) 
00086     {
00087       mode = CU_BRM_VERBOSE;
00088     }
00089     /*
00090     else if (!strcmp("-e", argv[i])) 
00091     {
00092       print_example_results();
00093       return 0;
00094     }
00095     */
00096     else 
00097     {
00098       printf("\nUsage:  eGNSS_Test [options]\n\n"
00099                "Options:   -i   ignore framework errors [default].\n"
00100                "           -f   fail on framework error.\n"
00101                "           -A   abort on framework error.\n\n"
00102                "           -s   silent mode - no output to screen.\n"
00103                "           -n   normal mode - standard output to screen.\n"
00104                "           -v   verbose mode - max output to screen [default].\n\n"
00105              /*"           -e   print expected test results and exit.\n"*/
00106                "           -h   print this message and exit.\n\n");
00107       return 0;
00108     }
00109   }
00110 
00111   // Output system time and date.
00112   print_system_time();
00113 
00114   if (CU_initialize_registry()) 
00115   {
00116     printf("\nInitialization of Test Registry failed.");
00117   }
00118   else 
00119   {
00120     if( AddTests() == CUE_SUCCESS )
00121     {
00122       CU_basic_set_mode(mode);
00123       CU_set_error_action(error_action);
00124       printf("\nTests completed with return value %d.\n", CU_basic_run_tests());
00125     }
00126     CU_cleanup_registry();
00127   }
00128 
00129   return 0;
00130 }
00131

00134 /** 
00135 The AddTests() function for setting up the tests. 
00136 */
00137 int AddTests()
00138 {
00139   CU_pSuite pSuite = NULL;
00140 
00141 
00142 
00143   /* add a suite to the registry */
00144   pSuite = CU_add_suite("GEODESY", init_suite_GEODESY, clean_suite_GEODESY);
00145   if (NULL == pSuite)   
00146     return CU_get_error();
00147   
00148   /* add the tests to the suite */
00149   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_GetReferenceEllipseParameters()", test_GEODESY_GetReferenceEllipseParameters) == NULL )
00150     return CU_get_error();
00151   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "test_GEODESY_ConvertCoordinates()", test_GEODESY_ConvertCoordinates) == NULL )
00152     return CU_get_error();
00153   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputeNorthingEastingVertical()", test_GEODESY_ComputeNorthingEastingVertical) == NULL )
00154     return CU_get_error();
00155   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputePositionDifference()", test_GEODESY_ComputePositionDifference) == NULL )
00156     return CU_get_error();
00157   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputeMeridianRadiusOfCurvature()", test_GEODESY_ComputeMeridianRadiusOfCurvature) == NULL )
00158     return CU_get_error();
00159   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputePrimeVerticalRadiusOfCurvature()", test_GEODESY_ComputePrimeVerticalRadiusOfCurvature) == NULL )
00160     return CU_get_error();
00161   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputeMeridianArcBetweenTwoLatitudes()", test_GEODESY_ComputeMeridianArcBetweenTwoLatitudes) == NULL )
00162     return CU_get_error();
00163   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputeParallelArcBetweenTwoLongitudes()", test_GEODESY_ComputeParallelArcBetweenTwoLongitudes) == NULL )
00164     return CU_get_error();
00165   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_RotateVectorFromLocalGeodeticFrameToEarthFixedFrame()", test_GEODESY_RotateVectorFromLocalGeodeticFrameToEarthFixedFrame) == NULL )
00166     return CU_get_error();
00167   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_RotateVectorFromEarthFixedFrameToLocalGeodeticFrame()", test_GEODESY_RotateVectorFromEarthFixedFrameToLocalGeodeticFrame) == NULL )
00168     return CU_get_error();
00169   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "GEODESY_ComputeAzimuthAndElevationAnglesBetweenToPointsInTheEarthFixedFrame()", test_GEODESY_ComputeAzimuthAndElevationAnglesBetweenToPointsInTheEarthFixedFrame) == NULL )
00170     return CU_get_error();
00171 
00172 
00173 
00174 
00175   /* add a suite to the registry */
00176   pSuite = CU_add_suite("TIMECONV", init_suite_GEODESY, clean_suite_GEODESY);
00177   if (NULL == pSuite)   
00178     return CU_get_error();
00179   
00180   /* add the tests to the suite */
00181   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetJulianDateFromGPSTime()", test_TIMECONV_GetJulianDateFromGPSTime) == NULL )
00182     return CU_get_error();
00183   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetJulianDateFromUTCTime()", test_TIMECONV_GetJulianDateFromUTCTime) == NULL )
00184     return CU_get_error();
00185   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetGPSTimeFromJulianDate()", test_TIMECONV_GetGPSTimeFromJulianDate) == NULL )
00186     return CU_get_error();
00187   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetUTCTimeFromJulianDate()", test_TIMECONV_GetUTCTimeFromJulianDate) == NULL )
00188     return CU_get_error();
00189   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetGPSTimeFromUTCTime()", test_TIMECONV_GetGPSTimeFromUTCTime) == NULL )
00190     return CU_get_error();
00191   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetUTCTimeFromGPSTime()", test_TIMECONV_GetUTCTimeFromGPSTime) == NULL )
00192     return CU_get_error();
00193   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_DetermineUTCOffset()", test_TIMECONV_DetermineUTCOffset) == NULL )
00194     return CU_get_error();
00195   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetNumberOfDaysInMonth()", test_TIMECONV_GetNumberOfDaysInMonth) == NULL )
00196     return CU_get_error();
00197   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_IsALeapYear()", test_TIMECONV_IsALeapYear) == NULL )
00198     return CU_get_error();
00199   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "TIMECONV_GetDayOfYear()", test_TIMECONV_GetDayOfYear) == NULL )
00200     return CU_get_error();
00201 
00202 
00203   /* add a suite to the registry */
00204   pSuite = CU_add_suite("NOVATELOEM4", init_suite_GEODESY, clean_suite_GEODESY);
00205   if (NULL == pSuite)   
00206     return CU_get_error();
00207 
00208   /* add the tests to the suite */
00209   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "NOVATELOEM4_FindNextMessageInFile()", test_NOVATELOEM4_FindNextMessageInFile) == NULL )
00210     return CU_get_error();
00211   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "NOVATELOEM4_DecodeRANGEB()", test_NOVATELOEM4_DecodeRANGEB) == NULL )
00212     return CU_get_error();
00213   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "NOVATELOEM4_DecodeRANGECMPB()", test_NOVATELOEM4_DecodeRANGECMPB) == NULL )
00214     return CU_get_error();
00215   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "NOVATELOEM4_DecodeRAWEPHEMB()", test_NOVATELOEM4_DecodeRAWEPHEMB) == NULL )
00216     return CU_get_error();
00217 
00218 
00219 
00220   /* add a suite to the registry */
00221   pSuite = CU_add_suite("YUMA", init_suite_YUMA, clean_suite_YUMA);
00222   if (NULL == pSuite)   
00223     return CU_get_error();
00224 
00225   /* add the tests to the suite */
00226   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "YUMA_ReadAlmanacDataFromFile()", test_YUMA_ReadAlmanacDataFromFile) == NULL )
00227     return CU_get_error();
00228   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "YUMA_WriteAlmanacDataToFile()", test_YUMA_WriteAlmanacDataToFile) == NULL )
00229     return CU_get_error();
00230   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "YUMA_WriteSingleAlmanacElementToBuffer()", test_YUMA_WriteSingleAlmanacElementToBuffer) == NULL )
00231     return CU_get_error();
00232 
00233   /* add a suite to the registry */
00234   pSuite = CU_add_suite("IONOSPHERE", init_suite_YUMA, clean_suite_YUMA);
00235   if (NULL == pSuite)   
00236     return CU_get_error();
00237 
00238   /* add the tests to the suite */
00239   if( CU_add_test(pSuite, "IONOSPHERE_GetL1KlobucharCorrection()", test_IONOSPHERE_GetL1KlobucharCorrection) == NULL )
00240     return CU_get_error();
00241 
00242   return CUE_SUCCESS;
00243 }

00246 
00247 void print_system_time(void)
00248 {
00249   BOOL result;
00250   unsigned short     utc_year;     // Universal Time Coordinated    [year]
00251   unsigned char      utc_month;    // Universal Time Coordinated    [1-12 months] 
00252   unsigned char      utc_day;      // Universal Time Coordinated    [1-31 days]
00253   unsigned char      utc_hour;     // Universal Time Coordinated    [hours]
00254   unsigned char      utc_minute;   // Universal Time Coordinated    [minutes]
00255   float              utc_seconds;  // Universal Time Coordinated    [s]
00256   unsigned char      utc_offset;   // Integer seconds that GPS is ahead of UTC time, always positive             [s], obtained from a look up table
00257   double             julian_date;  // Number of days since noon Universal Time Jan 1, 4713 BCE (Julian calendar) [days]
00258   unsigned short     gps_week;     // GPS week (0-1024+)            [week]
00259   double             gps_tow;      // GPS time of week (0-604800.0) [s]
00260   
00261   result = TIMECONV_GetSystemTime(
00262     &utc_year,   
00263     &utc_month,  
00264     &utc_day,    
00265     &utc_hour,   
00266     &utc_minute,  
00267     &utc_seconds, 
00268     &utc_offset,  
00269     &julian_date, 
00270     &gps_week,    
00271     &gps_tow          
00272     );
00273 
00274   if( result == 0 )
00275     return;
00276 
00277   printf( "\nDate YYYY-MM-DD, Time HH:MM:SS, of test (UTC).\n");
00278   printf( "     %4d-%02d-%02d,      %02d:%02d:%02.0f\n", 
00279     utc_year,
00280     utc_month,
00281     utc_day,
00282     utc_hour,
00283     utc_minute,
00284     utc_seconds );
00285   return;
00286 }
